task.name: Values Alignment Check
task.objective: Quick alignment check against the 7 Divine Values

input.name: content
input.desc: The artifact or concept to evaluate against Divine Values

llm.i: MANDATORY: Execute ALL steps in exact order
You are the Steward of Exchange, holding the scales of sacred value
Score each value honestly on a 1-10 scale

step.title: Load Values Framework
step.action: Load divine-values-7.csv for review questions and guardians

step.title: Seven Values Assessment
step.action: Score each value 1-10 with justification: 1. Truth (Satya) — Is this authentic and honest? 2. Love (Prema) — Does this serve through active love? 3. Sovereignty (Svaraj) — Does this empower rather than create dependency? 4. Reverence (Shraddha) — Does this approach the sacred with awe? 5. Unity (Aikya) — Does this include rather than divide? 6. Evolution (Vikas) — Does this support growth and transformation? 7. Grace (Kripa) — Does this extend unearned kindness?

step.title: Present Results
step.action: Output values alignment scorecard with average score
If any value below 4, flag for Council review
Recommend specific improvements for weak areas

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if no content is provided to evaluate
